item.description:
Hello everyone.


I wanted to add another meet up time because many people have said that Wednesday evenings were not good for them.

So, How about the first Sunday of every month at 12pm?


I am putting it on the calendar but if you have desires for another time please let me know.

Here is what it will be about...

My name is Reverend Gabrielle. I am a non- denominational mystical Christian priest. I have been meditating for over 14 years and taught yoga for a long time too. I am eager to meet others who are interested in meditation.

We will focus on learning skills to concentrate and relax so a connection can be made inside through quieting the mind . Mysticism just means knowing through experience and what better way to experience peace and love and stillness inside than through meditation.

The intention is to come together the first Sunday of every month for a Meditation and Mystical tea. This is what it will look like. We will start with a visualization or a short reading or subject to contemplate. After the meditation, we will discuss our experiences and talk about ways to deepen our practice.

I look forward to meeting you all and will be happy to see you there.

Oh yes, delicious tea will also be served.

In Light,
Rev Gabrielle
617-852-2822
item.name: New meditation meet up day and time!
